WorkItem.ClosedComment:
As part of our move to GitHub, we're closing our CodePlex issues and suggestions and asking that people move them to the GitHub issue tracker for further discussion.  Some issues and feature requests may already be active on GitHub, so please make sure to look for an existing issue before filing a new one.

You can find our GitHub issue tracker here:
https://github.com/microsoft/typeScript/issues
WorkItem.Description: The lib.d.ts file does not contain an interface for HTMLOptionsCollection.  I'll be sending a pull request with the fix.
WorkItem.Summary: HTMLSelectElement options should be a HTMLOptionsCollection

Comments.Message:
A pull request has been submitted: 

http://typescript.codeplex.com/SourceControl/network/forks/mateo2/typescript/contribution/3445

Thanks for the pull request.  We're currently working on accepting pull requests (some logistics on our side are getting ironed out).

To my understanding, the lib.d.ts is being auto-generated by the DOM spec.  I'll look into why HTMLOptionsCollection isn't being picked up correctly.
